content: (I posted this also to Argonaut COVID-19 topic) Good morning, I'd like to share with you the approach Dedalus is having with FHIR modelling for the COVID-19 emergency, with a particular focus on scenarios in Italy and France (currently). You can find our public contributions here (profiles and examples): https://simplifier.net/covid-19, there's also a short abstract and a visual map to better understand the content available. Hope it can be helpful!
I think it might be useful to post it also here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewrecentblogposts.action?key=CR but I have no credentials to access
Thank you for sharing this publicly @Pier Alberto Gibellini! You can request a Confluence account via https://jira.hl7.org/secure/CreateIssue.jspa?pid=11200&issuetype=11300.
